scripts.download:private-key: aws s3 cp s3://tf-common-backend/env:/$(terraform workspace show)/$(jq -r '.name' package.json)/kp-$(jq -r '.name' package.json)-app-$(terraform workspace show).pem .
scripts.download:tfvars: aws s3 cp s3://tf-common-backend/env:/$(terraform workspace show)/$(jq -r '.name' package.json)/terraform.tfvars .
scripts.connect: ssh -i kp-$(jq -r '.name' package.json)-app-$(terraform workspace show).pem $(jq -r '.app_instance_username.value' output.json)@$(jq -r '.app_instance_public_ip.value' output.json)
